scenario_text.value:
Wow, you’re all pretty good!
Can we fight a little longer?!

Oh jeez, man, I don’t think we can take
another round with this guy...

But he seems like he’s raring to go...!
I don’t think we can avoid it!

That’s far enough, Baihumon. They’ve more
than proven their strength, I’d say.

Baihumon...? Not only that, but there were
other survivors here...
And one of the destined is among them...

...Right.
Very well.

I don’t get any of this...but it looks like
our bacon’s been saved.
I think you’re right...

Baihumon...one of the Four Sovereign Monsters!
Never thought I’d meet you!

The Four Sovereign Monsters?! The beings that
can seal the Master?!

That’s right. I’m just one of their
followers.

We were sent here by the Imperial Court. To
make provisions for troubled times.

We received the power of the god beasts,
and we used it to govern Nippon.

In return, the five of us were offered up as
sacrifices...
I see. So that’s what happened!

I don’t really get it, but...
I suppose we should hear them out?
I think so. Let’s listen for now.

Still, that power was incredible, and
fearsome to behold...

One of our friends, Haruchika, was swallowed
up by that power, and went berserk...

In exchange for power, my compatriots and
I lost our human hearts...

Now we remain here with Baihumon in order to
bind Haruchika...

But it appears that, too, has reached its
limit. Your arrival may be providence.
Reached its limit? What do you mean?
I speak of that fog.

Even with our presence here, the fog is
slowly but surely destroying this world.

No, not just the world—the souls wandering
this world have begun to vanish as well.
Surely we shall be no exception.

In other words...you who protect this world
are feeling the impact of its destruction...
That’s what you mean by your limit...?

Yes, as you say.
My end is simply a matter of time.

The destruction has sent everything into
disarray...

So...would fixing this world mean we could
restore Miyuki to her former self?
Miyuki?

One of our friends. Right now she’s being
possessed by the Master...

Yes, the Master is trying to make sacrifices
of us by using her form.

How curious... I never thought he’d use a
possessed human as an ally...

Ah... I see. Haruchika is using the girl to
grant his final wish...

That fearsome desire...
He still hasn’t given up on it?

(I don’t quite get it, but if we borrow this
person’s power maybe we can get Miyuki back!)

Please! Lend us your strength to help us save
Miyuki!
(What’s our next goal?)
Wanna go home!
Wanna save Miyuki!
Wanna save the worlds!
Wanna go home!

We all made a promise! That we’d all survive
and go home together, with no sacrifices!

That means we want to bring Miyuki back with
us, too! Please!
Are friends!

All of us have bonded over the tough times
we’ve experienced in this world!
Miyuki is a close friend of ours! Please!
Wanna save the worlds!
We want to save our world, and this one!

To do that, we have to save Miyuki no matter
what! Please!
...Your wish has been heard loud and clear.
Then...

You must go meet the other Sovereign Monsters
and show them your power.

Here at the Western Shrine, your power is
clear to us. But three shrines remain.

The power of the Four Sovereign Monsters
should be able to restore Master to normal...
The power of the Four Sovereign Monsters...

Some of the power to suppress Haruchika
returned when you learned of me and Baihumon.

This area should be safe now, but the attacks
on other altars will be more intense.
More intense than it was here, huh...

The barrier strength is weakening to the
north, east, and south, in that order.

I do not know the exact locations of these
altars, but the fog should show the way.

The fog will show the way... North, east, and
south...
I... I don’t think I can remember all that...
Neither can I...
Don’t worry, I have it memorized.

But man, this is all so complicated. Can’t
they just all meet up somewhere?

That’s probably a tall order, given how their
power’s weakened...
The rest is up to you...
Whoa!!!
What the—what’s going on?!

We leave the ambition we could not fulfill
up to all of you...
